title: The Summer in You
description: "The summer in you calms the winter in me"The Summer in You' is a taste of 14 weeks of a lover's summer. Penned by the talented Saiber, these GENDER NEUTRAL poems are intertwining tales of the writer's simple words and the reader's emotions.Companion to the poet's full length debut, Stardust and Sheets, this tiny book is filled with poems in the form of stories that are personal yet universal. This book is to be enjoyed in the gentleness of a warm summer breeze with the thoughts of your lover and these words to guide you by.
author: Saiber
